dict.acceptation: 坏的，不好的；严重的；不舒服的；低劣的，有害的；

sent.orig: Best is the superlative form of good and worst is the superlative form of bad.
sent.trans: “best”是“good”的最高级形式，“worst”是“bad”的最高级形式。

sent.orig: Designating the vowel a as pronounced in bad or cat.
The words'small' and ' bad' are adjectives.
This will hold your BAD-Ad together while you work as the frame when you're finished.
sent.trans: 当你在做的时候，这可以保持你的BAD-Ad在一起，当你做好的时候，它就像个画框一样。

sent.orig: The state of the stream is revealed by the bad, fail, eof, and good operations.
sent.trans: 流的状态由bad、fail、eof和good操作提示。
